titleStmt.title: Self-imployment in secret ... left under the hand-writing of that learned & reverend divine, Mr. John Corbet ...; with a prefatory epistle of Mr. John Howe.
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.
Howe, John, 1630-1705.

notesStmt.note: "Containing I. Evidences upon Self-Examination. II. Thoughts upon Painful Afflictions. III. Memorials for Practice.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
